Title: 42498 - # Reasons to Learn About Cloud Storage for Smartphones
Direction: 500 words. Write three to six reasons why someone should learn more about cloud storage options for their smartphone. Android phones automatically come with cloud storage via Google, but some users would like to keep their data backed up elsewhere. Discuss why they should learn more about cloud storage before going ahead and installing the first cloud storage app they come across in the Play store. Appeal to Android users who are a little tech savvy. Consider anchoring the client text in a sentence that discusses excellent educational sources to learn more about using a cloud service with a smartphone.

Title: 42499 - # Reasons to Learn Everything You Can About Cloud Security
Direction: 500 words. Write about three to six reasons why it's important to learn the ins and outs of cloud security. Some of the reasons include: keeping sensitive data out of the reach of hackers, HIPPA compliance, internal security measures, and more. Many people think that they put data into cloud storage is leave it there and forget about it until needed again, but cloud storage needs to provide security to protect those files for further retrieval. Target individuals who are interested in technology, may not be as savvy about cloud storage. Consider anchoring the client URL in a sentence that discusses cloud security educational resources.

Title: 42500 - # Reasons Why It's Important to Use a Cloud Services Provider Who Puts Security First
Direction: 500 words. Write 3 to 6 reasons why it's important to use a cloud services provider who focuses on keeping data secure. Cloud security breaches happen on a regular basis and it's due to the provider not putting security first. Focus on the reasons why cloud security needs to be the number one priority of the provider, and the ways that cloud services get breached on a regular basis. Appeal to IT professionals who want to learn more about potential weaknesses in cloud security. Consider anchoring the text in a sentence that discusses why it's important for end users to learn more about cloud security.

Title: 42501 -  # Reasons Companies Are Implementing BYOD
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 reasons more companies are trying BYOD policies. This includes cost effectiveness for the company (BYOD means companies don't have to buy and distribute hardware), remote work employees also increasing in popularity, and the wide variety of security and storage options available. Link to the client in this third section, and explain that companies that were nervous about BYOD policies are now more confident in their security systems after educating themselves. The target audience is small business owners who are considering implementing BYOD polices within the company but want to know the opportunities and drawbacks of trying it.
